overview: Episode 1 Wife’s Revenge  A wife suspects her husband of having an affair so she convinces a husbands friend to help her get revenge.  Episode 2 Orgasm Addict  A husband’s hometown friend comes to stay as his home. One day when the husband is away, the friend learns something new from the wife about life and dangerous love.  Episode 3 Overnight Classmates  A man who has lived alone and without marriage due to erectile dysfunction meets a former classmate who makes his body feel alive.
title: Lusty Tales of Married Women
